Tak Terbitkan Perppu KPK Jokowi Dinilai Berikan Harapan Palsu
03 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memberi kode belum akan menerbitkan Perppu KPK dengan alasan menunggu proses uji materi di MK. Jokowi dinilai hanya memberikan harapan palsu kepada masyarakat.
"Presiden Jokowi berikan harapan palsu kepada masyarakat karena beberapa waktu lalu ketika mengundang beberapa orang ke Istana, sempat mengeluarkan statemen bahwa akan mempertimbangkan perppu, tapi faktanya kemarin sudah dibantah, karena alasan sopan santun menghargai judicial review di MK," kata peneliti ICW, Kurnia Ramadhana, di kantornya, Kalibata, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Tak hanya itu, Jokowi dinilai tak mempertimbangkan banyaknya korban dalam aksi masyarakat menolak Revisi UU KPK di berbagai daerah sebagai keadaan yang mendesak. Padahal sudah ada korban yang meninggal.
Selain itu, Jokowi dinilai mengingkari janji politiknya mendukung pemberantasan korupsi. ICW mengaku kecewa karena pada praktiknya revisi UU KPK disahkan dan hingga kini belum terbit Perppu KPK.
"Ada janji politik yang disampaikan seorang Jokowi sebelum dia jadi presiden, ketika Nawacita poin keempat dia secara tegas menolak negara lemah dan mendukung pemberantasan korupsi, nyatanya lima tahun 2014-2019 itu tidak terealisasi," ujarnya.
"Diulangi lagi ketika Jokowi juga belum sebagai Presiden ketika mengikuti kontestasi politik 2019, menyebutkan dalam misi pemerintahan Jokowi mendukung upaya pemberantasan korupsi, lagi-lagi ingkar terhadap janjinya," sambung Kurnia.

Unpublished Jokowi's KPK Perppu Is Giving False Hopes
03 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) gave a code that he would not issue a KPPU Perppu on the grounds of waiting for the material testing process at the Constitutional Court. Jokowi is considered to only give false hopes to the community.
"President Jokowi gave false hope to the public because some time ago when he invited several people to the Palace, he had issued a statement that he would consider a Perppu, but the fact yesterday was disputed, for reasons of courtesy respecting judicial review at the Constitutional Court," said ICW researcher, Kurnia Ramadhana , in his office, Kalibata, South Jakarta, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Not only that, Jokowi is considered not to consider the number of victims in community actions rejecting the Revision of the KPK Law in various regions as an urgent situation. Even though there have been victims who died.
In addition, Jokowi is considered to have broken his political promise to support the eradication of corruption. ICW claimed to be disappointed because in practice the revision of the KPK Law was passed and until now the KPK Perppu has not been published.
"There was a political promise delivered by a Jokowi before he became president, when Nawacita the fourth point he firmly rejected a weak state and supported the eradication of corruption, in fact the five years 2014-2019 was not realized," he said.
"It was repeated again when Jokowi was not yet the President when he joined the 2019 political contestation, mentioning the Jokowi's government mission to support efforts to eradicate corruption, again reneging on his promises," continued Kurnia.
